imgCredit: Matlock Tor by Moonlight by Joseph Wright of Derby
name: The End Approaches
description:
The shadow is slowly growing across the world, the lands falling into darkness. The sun still rises, but barely gives any light, the days as dark as nights once were. The nights themselves inky black, regardless of the moon, and filled with terrors which were once mere myth and legend.

You are now at 50% world shadow

choices.name: The heavens are mourning the death of the sun
